metadata.title: CVE-2021-20190 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in jackson-databind before 2.9.10.7. FasterXML mishandlesthe interaction between serialization gadgets and typing. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity aswell as system availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.13.2.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13.2.2-1').
